name: Brew: Innoculative Philter
effect: Though 'tis an unsavory and turgid medicine, it nevertheless prevents the effects of poisoning or disease from taking hold on the body. One ounce of this provides protection for eight hours. The reaction yields four ounces of mixture.

name: Brew: Stimulant
effect: A drink of this tangy and effervescent mixture brings pep and vigor to one's body, regaining lost willpower. While in effect, one gains

name: Brew: Antivenin
effect: A vile and brackish concoction. Nevertheless, one ounce is all that is required to cure ongoing poisons and ailments. The reaction yields 4 ounces of the substance.

name: Brew: Curative Potion
effect: A crimson philter of lion or bear's blood is precipitated in alchemical solution. The reaction yields 4 ounces of liquid, which are stored in a stoppered flask. As an action, you may drink up to 4 ounces from the flask, healing 1d4 damage each.

name: Brew: Eloquence Philter
effect: A xanthous solution of egg yolk and four-leaf clovers is condensed from an alchemical mixture. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining 1 point of charisma until the next long rest.

name: Brew: Amphibic Philter
effect: Produces a viscous extract, condensed from an alchemical mixture of frog feet and fish scales. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining the ability to breathe underwater for 30 minutes.

name: Brew: Anaesthetic Potion
effect: Produces a transparent liquid, distilled from an alchemical solution of crushed glass and mermaid tears. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. In drinking the potion, you gain 2d6 temporary HP and 1d4 temporary willpower, and your nerves are greatly dulled to the sensation of pain.

name: Brew: Hermetic Philter
effect: A pale solution of ostrich feathers and gazelle blood is condensed from an alchemical mixture. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining 1 point of speed until the next long rest.

name: Brew: Vigor Philter
effect: Produces an effervescent yellow potion which swirls without cessation. The reaction produces 1 ounce of product, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining 2 points of dexterity until the next long rest.

name: Brew: Persistence Philter
effect: A cerulean solution of crushed pearl and gold dust is extracted from an alchemical solution. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining 1 point of intelligence until the next long rest.

name: Brew: Hallucinogenic
effect: A cerulean solution of crushed pearl and gold dust is extracted from an alchemical solution. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining 1 point of intelligence until the next long rest.

name: Brew: Acumen Philter
effect: Produces a cerulean solution of crushed pearl and gold dust, which forms at the top of an alchemical mixture. The reaction yields 1 ounce of product, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining 2 points of intelligence until the next long rest.

name: Brew: Potency Philter
effect: A cerulean solution of crushed pearl and gold dust is extracted from an alchemical solution. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining 1 point of intelligence until the next long rest.

name: Brew: Invisibility Potion
effect: A glowing, translucent potion remains after aught else is boiled away. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, so becoming invisible for 10 minutes.

name: Brew: Elixir of Invulnerability
effect: A dark crimson concoction derived from crushed bricks, tar, and grass plucked from between cobblestones. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, which is stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, gaining immunity to all forms of damage for 1 minute.

name: Brew: Elixir of Immortality
effect: A shimmering gold solution containing the essence of life is distilled from an alchemical solution. The reaction yields 1 ounce of liquid, stored in a vial. As an action, you may drink the contents of the vial, so extending your life by 500 years.
